analyzed: manydzu shr'i badzra s'a dha nam /
translated: Mañjuśrīvajrasādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'jam dpal rdo rje'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: 'jam dpal rdo rje'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Attaining Mañjuvajra

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, glorious Vajrasattva.

original: rin chen padma r'a ga ltar //
analyzed: rin chen padma r'a ga ltar //
translated: Like a jewel, a lotus, or a ruby,

original: shes rab mchog ldan mdangs gsal ba //
analyzed: shes rab mchog ldan mdangs gsal ba //
translated: endowed with supreme wisdom, radiant,

original: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la btud nas //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la btud nas //
translated: I bow to Mañjuvajra

original: de yi sgrub thabs 'di brtsam bya //
analyzed: de yi sgrub thabs 'di brtsam bya //
translated: and compose this means of his attainment.

original: dang por mal nas langs te gdong la sogs pa dag par bya ste /
analyzed: dang por mal nas langs te gdong la sogs pa dag par bya ste /
translated: First, having risen from bed, one should purify one's face and so forth.

original: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom ste /
analyzed: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom ste /
translated: One should visualize a moon maṇḍala in one's heart.

original: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis bgegs rnams phyogs bcur bskrad par bya ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis bgegs rnams phyogs bcur bskrad par bya ste /
translated: Light rays emanating from that should frighten away the obstructors in the ten directions.

original: gsang sngags ni 'di'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags ni 'di'o //
translated: The secret mantra is this:

original: aom aa mri ta kunda li h'um phat /
analyzed: aom aa mri ta kunda li h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ amṛta-kuṇḍali hūṃ phaṭ.

original: de nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams gsal bar dmigs te /
analyzed: de nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams gsal bar dmigs te /
translated: Then, visualizing the buddhas and bodhisattvas dwelling in the sky,

original: yid kyis mchod pa byas te ;
analyzed: yid kyis mchod pa byas te ;
translated: one should make mental offerings.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje spyan drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje spyan drang bar bya'o //
translated: One should summon the Blessed One, Mañjuvajra.

original: aom ae hye hi bha ga b'a na manydzu badzra ma ma sha r'i re ma tishtha nam ku ru sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ae hye hi bha ga b'a na manydzu badzra ma ma sha r'i re ma tishtha nam ku ru sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ ehy ehi bhagavan mañjuśrī vajra mama śrīṃ tiṣṭha kuru svāhā.

original: de nas snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'jam pa'i rdo rje sku mdog dmar bo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: de nas snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'jam pa'i rdo rje sku mdog dmar bo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: Then, on top of the moon maṇḍala in one’s heart, one should imagine Mañjuvajra, red in color, adorned with all the ornaments,

original: phyag gnyis na rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang ba /
analyzed: phyag gnyis na rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang ba /
translated: holding a vajra and a bell in his two hands,

original: rma bya'i khri la rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs shing /
analyzed: rma bya'i khri la rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs shing /
translated: sitting in vajra posture on a peacock throne,

original: mo ha ku ma ri dang / r'a ga ku ma ri dang / air sha ku ma ri dang / ku la ku ma ri ste lha mo bzhi'o //
analyzed: mo ha ku ma ri dang / r'a ga ku ma ri dang / air sha ku ma ri dang / ku la ku ma ri ste lha mo bzhi'o //
translated: and the four goddesses, Moharakumārī, Rāgakumārī, Iṣṭakumārī, and Kulakumārī.

original: dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor bar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor bar bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine them surrounding the maṇḍala.

original: de dag kyang phyag gnyis ni rdo rje dang ral gri bsnams pa rma bya'i khri la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis @12a * //
analyzed: de dag kyang phyag gnyis ni rdo rje dang ral gri bsnams pa rma bya'i khri la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis @12a * //
translated: They also have two hands, holding a vajra and a sword, and are sitting on peacock thrones in vajra posture,

original: 'jo sgeg dang bcas bzhin rab tu bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jo sgeg dang bcas bzhin rab tu bzhugs pa'o //
translated: with a playful expression.

original: sku mdog ni bcom ldan 'das dang mtshungs par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: sku mdog ni bcom ldan 'das dang mtshungs par bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine the color of the body to be the same as the Bhagavat.

original: aom hr'i:mam ho:mam h'um /
analyzed: aom hr'i:mam ho:mam h'um /
translated: Om hrīḥ maṃ hoḥ maṃ hūṃ.

original: de dag ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i yi ge drug pa'i gsang sngags so //
analyzed: de dag ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i yi ge drug pa'i gsang sngags so //
translated: These are the secret mantras of the six syllables of Mañjuvajra.

original: aom brum lam h'um /🔽aom tram tram h'um /
analyzed: aom brum lam h'um / aom tram tram h'um /
translated: Om brūṃ laṃ hūṃ.🔽Om traṃ traṃ hūṃ.

original: aom hr'i mam h'um /
analyzed: aom hr'i mam h'um /
translated: Om hrīḥ maṃ hūṃ.

original: aom kham tam h'um /
analyzed: aom kham tam h'um /
translated: Om khaṃ taṃ hūṃ.

original: de dag ni lha mo bzhi'i yi ge bzhi pa'i gsang sngags so //
analyzed: de dag ni lha mo bzhi'i yi ge bzhi pa'i gsang sngags so //
translated: These are the secret mantras of the four syllables of the four goddesses.

original: mchod pa'i dus su phyi rol du padma 'dab ma bzhi byas shing dmigs te /
analyzed: mchod pa'i dus su phyi rol du padma 'dab ma bzhi byas shing dmigs te /
translated: At the time of worship, one should visualize four-petaled lotus outside,

original: dbus kyi lte ba la bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin bsam pa dang / shar phyogs la sogs pa'i 'dab ma bzhi la lha mo bzhi ji lta ba bzhin bsams la gsang sngags gong ma rnams kyis rim bzhin du mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: dbus kyi lte ba la bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin bsam pa dang / shar phyogs la sogs pa'i 'dab ma bzhi la lha mo bzhi ji lta ba bzhin bsams la gsang sngags gong ma rnams kyis rim bzhin du mchod par bya'o //
translated: and in the center of the hub one should imagine the Bhagavat Mañjuvajra just as he is, and on the four petals beginning with the east one should imagine the four goddesses just as they are, and one should worship them in order with the above secret mantras.

original: de nas gsang sngags 'dis 'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas gsang sngags 'dis 'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin par bya ste /
translated: Then one should give sacrificial cake to the bhūtas with this secret mantra:

original: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang se gol lan gsum gtog cing /
analyzed: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang se gol lan gsum gtog cing /
translated: One should give the gift with the mudra of supreme giving and snapping one's fingers three times,

original: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /🔽a'adya nutpan na tv'at ces bya ba'i sngags 'dis sbyin par bya'o ;
analyzed: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am / a'adya nutpan na tv'at ces bya ba'i sngags 'dis sbyin par bya'o ;
translated: and with the mantra, Om akaro mukha sarva dharmanam,🔽adyanutpanna tattva.

original: / de nas smon lam 'di lan gsum brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: / de nas smon lam 'di lan gsum brjod par bya ste /
translated: Then one should recite this aspiration three times:🔽May the realm of sentient beings,

original: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i //
analyzed: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i //
translated: as far as the ends of space in the ten directions,

original: sems can khams ni rab grol zhing //🔽'jam dpal sbyong pa ji bzhin du //
analyzed: sems can khams ni rab grol zhing // 'jam dpal sbyong pa ji bzhin du //
translated: be completely liberated,🔽and may I practice just like Manjushri.

original: de bzhin bdag ni sbyod gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: de bzhin bdag ni sbyod gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sadhana of glorious Bhagavat Manjushri is complete.
